text: Mar Dinkha IV (Syriac: and , born Dinkha Khanania; 15 September 1935 - 26 March 2015) was an Iraqi-American Syriac Christianity cleric. He was the Catholicos-Patriarch of the Assyrian Church of the East, headquartered in Chicago, Illinois, United States, from 1976 until his death. Dinkha IV was born in Darbandokeh to an Assyrian family. He was baptized. He was also a priest in Tehran, Iran. Dinkha IV died on 26 March 2015 in Rochester, Minnesota, aged 79. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2015 deaths Category:American Christians Category:Eastern Christians Category:Iraqi Christian clergy Category:Patriarchs
title: Dinkha IV
